```{r}
#1
seq(from=0, to=100,by=5)

#2

mean(vector)

#3

#4
```

2.2 Variablen definieren
1. Just DO it!
2. round(x=,digits=) 
3. rnorm(n, mean = 0, sd = 0)
4. seq(from = 1, to = 1, by = ((to - from)/(length.out - 1)),
    length.out = NULL, along.with = NULL, ...)
5.
```{r}
seq()
seq(1, 10)
seq(1, 10, 2)
#seq(1, 10, 2, 20) #--> too many Arguments
seq(1, 10, length.out = 20)
```
